traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: Naxene is a 6th level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13; +5 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation * 1st level (4 slots): mage armor, magic missile, shield * 2nd level (3 slots): misty step, suggestion * 3rd level (3 slots): fly, lightning bolt

actions.name: Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 2 (1d6-1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8-1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.
